title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Enterprise e-Learning-Based Simulation Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic office software and fundamental smartphone navigation skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform over 80% of key work processes through a mobile-based simulation module.
Learners resolve five types of conflict situations in customer service scenarios with 90% accuracy using VR scenarios.
Learners demonstrate the practical applicability of learning content by achieving a score of 75 or higher on weekly formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
